subject: African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ghana, the four-time champion, narrowly held on for a 1-0 win in its first game at the African Cup of Nations, defeating a Botswana team that was in its first major tournament.
snippet: Ghana, the four-time champion, narrowly held on for a 1-0 win in its first game at the African Cup of Nations, defeating a Botswana team that was in its first major tournament.
